name: Introduction to Anthropology
description: This course provides an introduction to the study of anthropology, including a description of its basic concepts, theories, and methods.

name: Ethnography
description: This course provides an introduction to ethnographic methods, including methods of participant observation, interviewing, and fieldwork.

name: Cultural Anthropology
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of cultural anthropology, including the study of culture and its effects on human behavior.

name: Psychological Anthropology
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of psychological anthropology, including the study of the psychological and cognitive aspects of culture and behavior.
